summary: Minimap doen't work in all Samples (shows only "loading")

comments.content:
Minimap doen't work in all Samples (shows only "loading")

when zoom or pan, minimap changes but keeps on showing loading the whole
time. Loading of normal maptiles works proper.

interaction with minimap works proper

DDMS log view doesn't show any error

This issue is not very specific. It's also a bit out-of-date.
See also issue 28, issue 29, issue 30.
The mini-map is fixed in the trunk in the org.osmdroid namespace. See Issue 124.
